alert.note: Alert for Ohio; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:54AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, CENTRAL SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, SOUTHERN KENTON, BOONE, NORTHERN GRANT, NORTH CENTRAL OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EDT... At 353 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Florence, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Elsmere, Walton, Rising Sun, Oakbrook, Burlington, Union, Crittenden, Vevay, Warsaw, Kentucky Speedway, Glencoe, Ghent, Sparta, Patriot, Atwood, Aberdeen and Ryle. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 47 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 160 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
